articles.title: President Kim Il Sung's achievements praised
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Il from Cambodian King
    Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a message of greetings on April 6 from Norodom Sihanouk, King of Cambodia, on the occasion of Sun's Day.   The message said:   His excellency Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, the great leader and President, set a good model of firm unity, friendship and love among all oppressed nations and peoples by unhesitatingly standing by the world people who aspire after liberation, independence and non-alignment.   Recalling the beneficial, noble and unforgettable friendship which was formed with the Generalissimo and is now being glorified by your excellency Marshal Kim Jong Il, supreme leader of the DPRK, I extend warm congratulations to you and the government and people of the DPRK.   The message heartily hoped that Kim Jong Il would accomplish the noblest historic cause.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam meets Indonesian cultural delegation
Preparatory committee formed in Greece
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam meets Indonesian cultural delegation
   Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK Kim Yong Nam met and conversed with an Indonesian cultural delegation headed by Marzuki Usman, Minister of Tourism, Art and Culture, participating in the 17th April Spring Friendship Art Festival at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on April 11.    Present there were chairman Jang Chol of the festival organizing committee and Indonesian ambassador to Korea Buchari Effendi.   
 The head of the Indonesian delegation said that Kimilsungia is the flower symbolizing the traditional friendship and unity between the DPRK and Indonesia and that the Indonesian people are very proud of this.   He expressed the belief that the Korean people under the wise guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il would surely build a p

owerful socialist nation.

articles.title: Floral basket laid before Kim Il Sung's  Portrait
articles.content:
Preparatory committee formed in Greece
     Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee to commemorate Sun's Day was formed in Greece on April 6 on the occasion of the 87th birth anniversary of the President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Youth, students and pupils visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Floral basket laid before Kim Il Sung's  Portrait
   Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A function to lay floral baskets before the Portrait of the President Kim Il Sung was held at Kim Il Sung Agricultural College of Cuba on April 7 on the occasion of Sun's Day.   The participants laid floral baskets before his portrait and paid homage to him.   The director of the college said that they would try hard to make it a model of the country in study and work so as to display the honor of being the college named after him.

articles.title: President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences published in U.S.
Korean people commemorate Sun's Day
articles.content:
President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences published in U.S.
    Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The 3rd volume of part one the anti-Japanese revolution of the President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century" was published by the J.A.M.S. Publishing House in the United States on the occasion of Sun's Day, his birthday.

articles.title: "Among the People" vol. 58 published
Investment in agriculture increases
articles.content:
"Among the People" vol. 58 published
   Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Worker's Party of Korea Publishing House published "Among the People" vol. 58 to mark the 87th birth anniversary of the  President Kim Il Sung.   The book carries 15 reminiscences showing noble and great traits of Kim Il Sung who showed unbounded love for the country and people, mixing with the people throughout his life.   Printed in the book are reminiscences of great love and care shown by the President for those related to his early revolutionary activities and their family members, not forgetting them even if several decades passed.   The book also tells how he led officials to work hard as true servants of the people and trained them to be true revolutionaries.

articles.title: African regional seminar on Juche idea
Sun's Day commemorated abroad
Anti-"government" struggle vowed in South Korea
articles.content:
Sun's Day commemorated abroad
   Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Sun's Day, the birthday of the President Kim Il Sung, is being commemorated in different countries.   Multifarious events including meetings, photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Tanzania, Mongolia, Cambodia, Mexico, India and Pakistan.     
 Speakers said: not only the Korean people but also the world people revere the great leader Kim Il Sung as the eternal President of the DPRK and the sun.  This is because he created the Juche idea and built Korean-style socialism of independence, self-support and self-reliance in defence in the east through its application.
Saying that Kim Jong Il inherited the revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung and is leading the Korean people to victory with single-hearted unity, they wished the Korean people greater successes in building a powerful socialist nation.   Rays of President Kim Il Sung, the sun, will illumine the road for humankind to follow forever, they said.   A meeting held in Tanzania adopted a letter to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Jang Chol meets cultural delegation and art troupe
U.S.-led NATO aggression on Yugoslavia assailed
articles.content:
Jang Chol meets cultural delegation and art troupe
   Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Jang Chol, chairman of the organizing committee of the 17th April Spring Friendship Art Festival, met Omar El Boar, vice-Minister of Culture who is the cultural representative of Egypt,  at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.   The representative said that the Egyptian people stood by the Korean people in the struggle for socialism and independence and  expressed the confidence that  equipped with Juche idea and the spirit of Chollima, they would surely reunify the country.   Jang Chol also had a talk with the art troupe of Koreans in Japan headed by Kim Hong Chol, the  leader of the Kumgangsan Opera Troupe of Chongryon, at the Pyongyang International House of Culture.
